summary: An outcast donkey in Roman era Judea with overlong ears finds his destiny on the way to Bethlehem.
cast: Roger Miller|Brenda Vaccaro|Paul Frees|Don Messick|Linda Gary|Iris Rainer|Shelly Hines|Eric Stern
keywords: christmas special|animal character name as title|nestor the donkey character|six word title|ears
director: Directors: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jr.
title: Nestor, the Long-Eared Christmas Donkey
